title: Kickoff for Saskatchewan Roughriders pre-season game delayed due to wildfire smoke
headline: Kickoff for Saskatchewan Roughriders pre-season game delayed due to wildfire smoke
summary: Poor air quality due to ongoing wildfires in northern Saskatchewan and Manitoba has forced a delay of the Saskatchewan Roughriders' final pre-season game.

title: As Manitoba wildfires rage, premier asks more people to evacuate
headline: As Manitoba wildfires rage, premier asks more people to evacuate
summary: The roughly 600 residents of Cranberry Portage in northwestern Manitoba were placed under a mandatory evacuation order because fire had knocked out power to the community.

title: Growing garlic by the thousands in Manitoba
headline: Growing garlic by the thousands in Manitoba
summary:
Rebekah Sandford planted 28,000 garlic plants by hand last year on her operation near St. Malo, Manitoba. She’s one of the few local garlic growers in the province and on the Prairies. 
The post Growing garlic by the thousands in Manitoba appeared first on Manitoba Co-operator.

title: Wheat stuck trading sideways
headline: Wheat stuck trading sideways
summary:
Wheat seems to be floating above the tarrif fray without the wild price swings of other crops. 
The post Wheat stuck trading sideways appeared first on Manitoba Co-operator.

title: Free spuds recognize international potato day
headline: Free spuds recognize international potato day
summary: The lower-cost potato vegetable compared to other produce items is a key to global food security and overall nutrition

title: Future worries U.S. wheat growers
headline: Future worries U.S. wheat growers
summary: The National Association of Wheat Growers is concerned that U.S. wheat production could be migrating north.
